=CSS=

=Javascript=
==Content Toggle: data-toggle="#target, .target"==
You can use this value as '#id' or '.class'. One or more than value can use.

HTML
{{{
<a href="#CONTENT" data-toggle="#CONTENT">...</a>
<div id="CONTENT">...</div>
}}}

JS - /modules/admin/tpl/js/admin.js
{{{
// Content Toggle
	$('.x [data-toggle]').click(function(){
		$($(this).attr('data-toggle')).toggle();
		return false;
	});

}}}

==Content Open: data-open="#target, .target"==
You can use this value as '#id' or '.class'. One or more than value can use.

HTML
{{{
<a href="#CONTENT" data-open="#CONTENT">OPEN</a>
<div id="CONTENT">
	This layer will be opened.
</div>
}}}

JS - /modules/admin/tpl/js/admin.js
{{{
// Close Layer
	$('.x [data-open]').click(function(){
		$($(this).attr('data-open')).hide();
		return false;
	});
}}}

==Content Close: data-close="#target, .target"==
You can use this value as '#id' or '.class'. One or more than value can use.

HTML
{{{
<div id="CONTENT">
	This layer will be closed.
	<button type="button" class="x_close" data-close="#CONTENT">&times;</button>
</div>
}}}

JS - /modules/admin/tpl/js/admin.js
{{{
// Close Layer
	$('.x [data-close]').click(function(){
		$($(this).attr('data-close')).hide();
		return false;
	});
}}}

==Horizontal Tab==

HTML
{{{
<div class="x_tabbable">
	<ul class="x_nav x_nav-tabs">
		<li class="x_active"><a href="#one">#1</a></li>
		<li><a href="#two">#2</a></li>
	</ul>
	<div class="x_tabcontent">
		<div class="x_tab-pane x_active" id="one">#1 CONTENT</div>
		<div class="x_tab-pane" id="two">#2 CONTENT</div>
	</div>
</div>
}}}

JS - /modules/admin/tpl/js/admin.js
{{{
// .x_tabbable
	var $tabbable = $('.x .x_tabbable');
	$tabbable.find('.x_tab-pane:not(".x_active")').hide();
	$tabbable.find('.x_nav-tabs>li>a').click(function(){
		var $this = $(this);
		$this.parent('li').addClass('x_active').siblings().removeClass('x_active');
		$tabbable.find($this.attr('href')).addClass('x_active').show().siblings().removeClass('x_active').hide();
		return false;
	});
}}}
